review: Best way to enjoy youtube on my TV!
author: Uxie

review: I enjoy this product, makes streaming netflix etc on your tv easier if you don't have something that is able to stream it.
author: Josh

review: Worked great for a few weeks but now I can't get it to run 5 minutes without getting a brain freeze error message. Purchased a fire stick and that works much better.
author: Adam Taft

review: Didn't come with any apps so I have to use my phone,tablet or pc to run it.  Amazon Fire costs less and has all the apps on it.  Fast too.  I wouldn't buy this again and nobody in my house wants it.
author: Tom Toro "TVMan"

review: Great product at the price, the only downside is there is no physical remote control, a device must be used. Doesn't really bother me but some people may be steered away for this reason alone.
author: Shane Rapson

review: Great device. Easy to set up and use. Good variety and good HD picture.
author: RRS "randron"

review: If I could rate it lower I would.  It updated in November 2014, and now it won't play anything for more than five minutes. It displays "Brainfreeze" and then you have to reconnect. It's great for watching commercials but nothing longer.
author: Amazon Customer
